meanings.sent1: The incoming mail is always delivered in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The students eagerly awaited the incoming guests for the school event.
meanings.sent3: The incoming storm clouds signaled a change in the weather.
meanings.sent4: The incoming tide brought in a variety of seashells to the shore.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the incoming train grew louder as it approached the station.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is coming in or arriving.
meanings.sent1: The airport staff directed the incoming passengers to the baggage claim area.
meanings.sent2: The security team was prepared to handle any unexpected situations with the incoming crowd.
meanings.sent3: The incoming of new technology made the old devices seem outdated.
meanings.sent4: The incoming of spring brought colorful flowers and warmer weather.
meanings.sent5: The company prepared a special welcome for the incoming CEO.
